title: Mauritius CPI Transportation
description: The transportation sub-index of the CPI basket in Mauritius increased to 141.12 points in October of 2022 from 140.70 points in September of 2022. CPI Transportation in Mauritius averaged 106.86 points from 2013 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 141.12 points in October of 2022 and a record low of 97.15 points in September of 2016. This page provides - Mauritius Cpi Transportation- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Central Statistics Office, Mauritius
